scenes.lighting: dim with phone light, early morning
scenes.title: Morning Alarm
scenes.description: Emily's phone alarm goes off on her nightstand. The room is still dim with early morning light filtering through blackout curtains. She reaches over from under her gray duvet to silence the phone. A small succulent plant sits on the nightstand next to a glass of water.
scenes.character_state: sleepy, just waking up, reaching for phone
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, young Asian woman, long black hair messy from sleep, dark brown eyes, sleepy expression, lying in bed, reaching for smartphone on nightstand, modern minimalist bedroom, gray duvet, succulent plant, dim early morning light, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple people, bright room, fully awake, standing

scenes.title: Returning to Bedroom After Bathroom
scenes.description: Emily walks back to her bedroom, now brighter with morning sunlight. Her bed is still unmade. Her closet door is open, revealing organized clothes. A full-length mirror stands in the corner.
scenes.character_state: awake, refreshed, deciding what to wear
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, young Asian woman, long black hair in ponytail, dark brown eyes, glasses, walking into bedroom, open closet with organized clothes, full-length mirror, unmade bed, morning sunlight, modern apartment bedroom, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple people, dark room, messy room, old furniture

scenes.title: Choosing Work Outfit
scenes.description: Emily stands in front of her open closet, considering what to wear. She pulls out a casual blouse and holds it up. The closet is organized with work clothes, casual wear, and several company hoodies.

scenes.title: Preparing Bed
scenes.description: Emily pulls back the covers on her bed and fluffs her pillows. She sets her phone on the nightstand charger and puts her glasses in their case. A book sits on the nightstand for nighttime reading.

scenes.title: Reading in Bed
scenes.description: Emily reads a novel in bed, propped against pillows with a small reading lamp on. Her glasses are back on for reading. The book is a paperback. She turns a page slowly.

scenes.title: Morning Bathroom Entry
scenes.description: Emily enters the shared bathroom, flipping on the light switch. The bathroom has a white tile floor, single vanity with mirror, and a shower with glass door. Toiletries are neatly organized in a caddy.

scenes.title: Face Washing

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model

notes.scene_selection_rationale: Selected 5 scenes per location to cover key vocabulary and actions. Balanced morning and evening scenes to show different lighting and activities. Included Asian cooking scenes to reflect cultural background.
notes.vocabulary_focus: POC scenes cover approximately 60 vocabulary items across bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen locations. Focus on modern apartment living, tech professional lifestyle, and Asian American cooking.
notes.character_consistency: All scenes should maintain Emily's core appearance: long straight black hair, dark brown eyes, slim petite build. Hair may be in ponytail, loose, or with headband depending on scene. Glasses worn except in sleeping/evening skincare scenes.
